EP_DownloadTooltip: Download Customization of Mask from the database
EP_UploadTooltip: Replace Customization of Mask in the database by JSON file
EP_UpgradeTooltip: Due to release upgrade Mask from the database has been replaced by OOTB Mask. You can still download previous Customization of Mask using Backup action.
EP_MaskNotFound: Customization / Mask in the installation does not exist. Upload a new Customization.
EP_JSonParseKO: The file cannot be parsed as a JSON. Select a valid JSON file.
EP_UploadOK: Customization of Mask replaced in the database. Refresh page to see the changes.
